short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus the first textarea that appears

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will bring focus to the first text bar on a web page.
It applies to pages from domains you have whitelisted, so you won't be frustrated by inadvertent focus.
